Diagnosis. A mEdIUm sIzEd spECIEs wITH TypICaL
Dicharax
- TypE rIbs ON R2, GLOssy R1 aNd R3, LONG R3 wITH bLUNT swELLING aNd sTrONGLy CrENULaTEd INNEr LIp.

Description. SHELL ( FIGUrE 41A ) bEIGE; sHELL OUTLINE sLIGHTLy OvaL frOm dOrsaL vIEw, spIrE aLmOsT fLaT, bOdy wHOrL rOUNdEd; prOTOCONCH LOw, CONsIsTING Of sLIGHTLy mOrE THaN 1.5 wHOrLs, GLOssy; R1 CONsIsTs Of sLIGHTLy mOrE THaN 1.75 wHOrLs, COarsELy, raTHEr IrrEGULarLy rIbbEd, rIbs wEakEr ON EdGE Of bOdy wHOrL (HErE THE sHELL Is aLmOsT smOOTH); TraNsITION bETwEEN R1 aNd R2 CLEarLy vIsIbLE dUE TO sUddEN INCrEasE Of rIb dENsITy; LENGTH Of R2 aNd R3 LEss THaN a HaLf wHOrL COmbINEd (abOUT 150–160 dEGrEEs), R2 sLIGHTLy sHOrTEr THaN R3; R2 vEry fINELy aNd dENsELy rIbbEd, rIbs LOw, CUrvEd TOwards THE apErTUrE; CrOss-sECTIONaL vIEw Of R2 COULd NOT bE ExamINEd, bUT prObabLy sImILar TO THOsE Of THE OTHEr spECIEs HavING CUrvEd rIbs; TraNsITION bETwEEN R2 aNd R3 CLEarLy vIsIbLE bECaUsE rIbbING sTOps aT OrIGIN Of TUbE, R3 aLmOsT smOOTH, ONLy wITH barELy vIsIbLE, IrrEGULar GrOwTH LINEs; CONsTrICTION bETwEEN R2 aNd R3 NOT CONspICUOUs; apErTUrE ExTErNaLLy sLIGHTLy, INTErNaLLy sTrONGLy CrENULaTEd by HavING fIvE sTrONG kNOTs; OUTEr LIp NOT vEry HIGH bUT sHarp, sLIGHTLy rEfLECTEd, sITUaTEd CLOsE TO THE apErTUrE, INNEr LIp THICkENEd.
Measurements (in mm). D = 4.6–5.4, H = 2.1–3.0 (N = 22, spECImENs frOm dIffErENT sampLEs).

caption.paragraph:
FIGURE 41. Shells of
Dicharax fraterculus (Bavay & Dautzenberg, 1900)
. A. holotype (MNHN IM-2012-27168). B. Vn10- 76. Scale represents 5 mm. All photos: B. Páll-Gergely.

subSubSection.paragraph: Operculum. THE OpErCULUm Of THE HOLOTypE Is aLmOsT smOOTH, bUT THaT Of sampLE MNHN IM- 2012-27038, wHICH Is IdENTICaL wITH THE TypE CONCHOLOGICaLLy, Has CLOsELy COILEd OpErCULUm (ObsErvEd IN 3 spECImENs). THE INNEr sUrfaCE Of THE OpErCULUm COULd NOT bE ExamINEd.

Variation in specimens. THE sHELLs frOm sOUTHErN
SON La PrOvINCE
( VN 10-76) HavE sLIGHTLy wIdEr UmbILICUs THaN THE ONEs frOm
LaNG SON
aNd CaO BaNG PrOvINCEs, aNd THE dIsTaNCE bETwEEN THE INNEr aNd OUTEr pErIsTOmEs Is smaLLEr ( THE pErIsTOmE Is OvEraLL THINNEr). THE pOpULaTIONs frOm
LaNG SON
aNd CaO BaNG PrOvINCEs sHOw NO NOTabLE varIabILITy IN TErms Of sHELL CHaraCTErs.

Differential diagnosis.
Dicharax fraterculus
dIffErs frOm
D. anthostoma
by THE smaLLEr, fLaTTEr sHELL, smOOTHEr R1 aNd ENTIrELy smOOTH R3, wEakEr CONsTrICTION aNd swELLING ON R3, OUTEr LIp sITUaTEd CLOsEr TO THE INNEr LIp, wHICH Has mOrE CUrvEd LObEs. SEE aLsO REmarks.

Distribution. THIs spECIEs Is kNOwN frOm NOrTHErN VIETNam ( sOUTHErN
SON La
,
LaNG SON
aNd QUaNG UyEN PrOvINCEs) ( FIGUrE 32 ).

Remarks. INITIaLLy wE CONsIdErEd syNONymIzING
Alycaeus fraterculus
wITH
Dicharax fimbriatus
, bECaUsE IT CaN bE INTErprETEd THaT THE fOrmEr faLLs wITHIN THE HUGE mOrpHOLOGICaL varIabILITy Of THE wIdEsprEad aNd CONCHOLOGICaLLy dIvErsE LaTTEr. WE dECIdEd TO kEEp
D. fraterculus
as a sEparaTE spECIEs bECaUsE
D. fraterculus Has
CONsErvaTIvE aNd CLEarLy rECOGNIzabLE TraITs (COmbINaTION Of sTrONGLy CrENULaTEd pErIsTOmE; GLOssy R1 aNd R3; LONG R2–R3, bLUNT swELLING ON R3), aNd THE raNGEs Of
D. fraterculus
aNd
D. fimbriatus
OvErLap wITHOUT mOrpHOLOGICaLLy INTErmEdIaTE fOrms.
